title: Disconnected after 15min
body:
All of a sudden, as of 2 days ago in multiple games, I just get disconnected with no means to get back into the game, even not after reboot.
LoL seems to be working fine. I have never experienced dc before and internet is working fine.

Anyone suggestion?.. My client I even recently (couple of months ago) refreshed by a clean install.

replies.body:
We've actually been seeing a lot of random issues with some EUW ISP's including BT, but I'd like to see if I can narrow down exactly what's happening just in case this isn't the issue you've been having. 

Run a quick traceroute to the EUW servers at 185.40.65.1 using [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and post the results here so we can take a look for any routing issues!
